class.name: CSGCylinder3D
class.description: This node allows you to create a cylinder for use with the CSG system. [b]Note:[/b] CSG nodes are intended to be used for level prototyping. Creating CSG nodes has a significant CPU cost compared to creating a [MeshInstance3D] with a [PrimitiveMesh]. Moving a CSG node within another CSG node also has a significant CPU cost, so it should be avoided during gameplay.

members.member: The bottom radius of the cylinder.
The number of sides of the cylinder, the higher this number the more detail there will be in the cylinder.
